definitions.text: the state of being covered with unclean things
the part of the earth's surface consisting of humus and disintegrated rock
material in the top layer of the surface of the earth in which plants can grow (especially with reference to its quality or use)
examples: the land had never been plowed

definitions.text: the geographical area under the jurisdiction of a sovereign state
examples: American troops were stationed on Japanese soil
don't soil your clothes when you play outside!
